content: > a free version of this pattern will be available on my website 1 > this pattern consists of a total of 70 squares i am unable to offer two versions of this pattern in ravelry but if you are interested in purchasing 25 large squares for $19 99 you can find the details on my website 2 welcome to the tunisian blanket cal of 2025 this marks the sixth year of our blanket cal and i m thrilled to share this year s project with you for the 2025 cal we ll be making 70 squares 25 large and 45 small each featuring a unique blackwork-inspired pattern the cal will run from january 7th until just before thanksgiving see the full schedule below throughout the cal i ll be releasing patterns for all 70 squares along with instructions for joining them and adding a border to the blanket i m so proud of how my blanket turned out and i can t wait to see yours i hope you re as excited about this cal as i am let s make some beautiful blankets together **release schedule** january 7 - general information & practice square 3 january 14 - large #1 4 january 21 - small #1 5 january 28 - large #2 6 february 4 - small #2 7 february 11 - large #3 8 february 18 - small #3 9 february 25 -
